marginalia.anchor_text: nostra[e] altitudinis parallelu[m] com meridiano, horizontem in quatuor quartas non a[e]qualiter

position.marginalia_text: falsum, si de acu intelligas / at rei natura veru[m] est.

marginalia.translation: It is wrong, if you understand with a needle, but it is true in the nature of the matter.

position.marginalia_text: non posse in quatuor quartas ina[e]quales diuidi, et et lineas quarta[m] respo[n]dere vero ortui [etc]

marginalia.translation: It cannot be divided in four unequal quarters and also to the lines correctly correspond to the origin

underline.text: nostra[e] altitudinis parallelu[m] com meridiano, horizontem in quatuor quartas non a[e]qualiter
acum in leste eadem altitudine procedere
Quod esse nequit absque altitudinis diminutione illius partis, unde nauis profecta fuit. Interrogatio

Expositione autem hac reiecta, ueram aggrediamur expositionem. Et ne tantum temporis consumatur, absque eo quòd causa sciatur, eam declarare conabor: quia officium meum causas explicare est: tuum uerò, effectum considerare

drawing.anchor_text: reiecta, ueram aggrediamur expositionem. Et ne tantum temporis consumatur, absque
